description: MURAL is the leading digital workspace for visual collaboration in the enterprise.

Nearpod offers an interactive, instructional platform that merges formative assessment and dynamic media for live and self-paced learning experiences. Nearpod was acquired by Renaissance Learning in February 2021.
Nelogica is an equity trading technology company in Brazil.

Neon is a mobile-first digital challenger bank focused exclusively on the Brazilian market. Neon offers banking services, savings products (personal financial management tools), and credit cards & loans to individuals and small businesses.
Nice One is the first and largest e-commerce platform for cosmetics in Saudi Arabia.
NotCo creates plant-based versions of animal products.

Nowports is a digital freight forwarder that helps companies improve their import and exporting process. It serves as a platform through which companies have visibility and real time notifications of their operations.
Nuvocargo is an all-in-one digital platform for cross border trade across the Americas, starting with trade between the USA and Mexico.
Olist assists small and medium businesses in Brazil with online marketplace sales and management.

OneTrust is a privacy, security and third-party risk management platform. Catapulting to unicorn status after a large first round of funding in 2019, OneTrust was listed as the #1 fastest-growing company on Inc. 5000 in August 2020.
Oyster is a global employment platform on a mission to remove barriers to cross border employment so that every talented person can have access to a great remote job.
Paack is a last-mile e-commerce package delivery solution offering scheduled same day and next day deliveries within 67 cities in 5 countries.

Paga is promoting financial inclusion across Nigeria as the country’s largest multichannel mobile money operator. It enables individual consumers to send and receive money transfers and empowers businesses to process payments.
Papara is a Turkish fintech company that provides services such as cash-in/cash-out, bill payments, commercial payments, and P2P payments.

Paxel is the first and only tech-enabled cold-chain fulfillment and last-mile platform that can deliver fresh+frozen food nationwide in Indonesia. The company brings local F&B SMEs nationwide through door-to-door cold fulfillment and last-mile delivery that is fast and secure.
Payhawk is a next generation financial system that combines credit cards, payments, expenses, cash management, and pre-accounting into one integrated experience
Peak Games is a global mobile gaming company which was acquired by Zynga in 2020.
Platzi is an EdTech platform that offers streaming online courses taught by tech industry leaders in design, marketing and programming.
Poke House is an Italian ‘fast-casual’ F&B chain that focuses on offering high-quality and affordable poke bowls across Europe.
Previta provides preventive healthcare services, including diagnostic tests, clinical laboratory exams, vaccinations, and a convenient and proprietary health-monitoring platform.
